1.16.5.undestroying-1.16.5-1.1.0:
Additions:
more types to saves your items from destruction (anvil, despawning, lightning bolt, tool breaking, void)
config to set the minimum required enchantment level and to disable specific types
bug fixes and improvements
1.16.5.undestroying-1.16.5-1.1.1:
Additions:
- config option for whether the undestroying enchantment is compatible with curse of binding
- translation for brazilian portuguese (pt_br) - thanks to Mikeliro
Changes:
- set tool breaking at durability 3 to prevent some breaking
Fixes:
- Mixin startup crash (closes #2)

Don't forget to update your config!
